languages.text: "Всему виной Теобальд Орселлио, второй хранитель Эурак-V. Старик... был великим навигатором, но более не мог контролировать свои силы. Я молил его уйти на покой, но он слишком помешался на нашей госпоже, леди Кассии. Его упрямство и безумие погубили всю станцию, ибо в порыве гнева он отверз третье око и излил ужасы варпа на неугодных ему. Теобальд, которого я знал, не стал бы использовать силы в столь неподходящий момент. Это сложно объяснить непосвященным, но я попытаюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Всему виной Теобальд Орселлио, второй хранитель Эурак-V. Старик... был великим Навигатором, но более не мог контролировать свои силы. Я молил его уйти на покой, но он слишком помешался на нашей госпоже, леди Кассии. Его упрямство и безумие погубили всю станцию, ибо в порыве гнева он отверз третье око и излил ужасы варпа на неугодных ему. Теобальд, которого я знал, не стал бы использовать силы в столь неподходящий момент. Это сложно объяснить непосвященным, но я попытаюсь".

languages.text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."
languages.original_text: "Всему виной Теобальд Орселлио, второй хранитель Эурак-V. Старик... был великим навигатором, но более не мог контролировать свои силы. Я молил его уйти на покой, но он слишком помешался на нашей госпоже, леди Кассии. Его упрямство и безумие погубили всю станцию, ибо в порыве гнева он отверз третье око и излил ужасы варпа на неугодных ему. traits.locale_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac-V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and contrariness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed horrors of the warp on those who drew his displeasure. The Theobald I used to know would never use his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

languages.text: "Die Schuld liegt bei Theobald Orsellio, dem zweiten Hüter von Eurac V. Der alte Mann ... war ein großartiger Navigator, doch er konnte seine Kräfte nicht länger kontrollieren. Ich habe ihn angefleht, sich zur Ruhe zu setzen, doch er war zu besessen von unserer Herrin, Lady Cassia. Sein Wahnsinn und seine Sturheit haben den Untergang für die gesamte Station bedeutet, denn er öffnete in einem Wutanfall sein drittes Auge und jagt die Schrecken des Warps auf alle, die ihn verärgerten. Der Theobald, den ich kannte, würde seine Kräfte niemals auf derart fahrlässige Weise einsetzen. Es wird schwierig sein, das {mf|einem|einer} Uneingeweihten zu erklären, doch ich werde es versuchen."
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

traits.locale_text: "Die Schuld liegt bei Theobald Orsellio, dem zweiten Hüter von Eurac V. Der alte Mann ... war ein großartiger Navigator, doch er konnte seine Kräfte nicht länger kontrollieren. Ich habe ihn angefleht, sich zur Ruhe zu setzen, doch er war zu besessen von unserer Herrin, Lady Cassia. Sein Wahnsinn und seine Sturheit haben den Untergang für die gesamte Station bedeutet, denn er öffnete in einem Wutanfall sein drittes Auge und jagt die Schrecken des Warps auf alle, die ihn verärgerten. Der Theobald, den ich kannte, würde seine Kräfte niemals auf derart fahrlässige Weise einsetzen. Es wird schwierig sein, das {mf|einem|einer} Uneingeweihten zu erklären, doch ich werde es versuchen."

languages.text: « La faute en revient à Théobald Orsellio, le second gardien d'Eurac-V. Ce vieillard... était un grand navigateur, mais il ne parvenait plus à contrôler ses pouvoirs. Je l'ai supplié de prendre sa retraite, mais il était trop obnubilé par notre maîtresse, dame Cassia. Sa folie et son obstination ont causé la perte de toute la station, car dans un accès de rage, il a ouvert son troisième œil et déchaîné les horreurs du Warp sur ceux qui l'avaient contrarié. Le Théobald que je connaissais n'aurait jamais utilisé ses pouvoirs de manière aussi inconsidérée. C'est difficile à expliquer à des non-initiés, mais je vais quand même essayer. »
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

traits.locale_text: « La faute en revient à Théobald Orsellio, le second gardien d'Eurac-V. Ce vieillard... était un grand navigateur, mais il ne parvenait plus à contrôler ses pouvoirs. Je l'ai supplié de prendre sa retraite, mais il était trop obsédé par notre maîtresse, dame Cassia. Sa folie et son obstination ont causé la perte de toute la station, car dans un accès de rage, il a ouvert son troisième œil et déchaîné les horreurs du Warp sur ceux qui l'avaient contrarié. Le Théobald que je connaissais n'aurait jamais utilisé ses pouvoirs de manière aussi inconsidérée. C'est difficile à expliquer à des non-initiés, mais je vais quand même essayer. »

languages.text: “这一切都得怪欧拉克五号星站的第二任守护者，西奥巴德·奥赛罗。那位老人……曾是位伟大的导航者，但他已经无法控制他的力量。我要求他让位，但他过于迷恋我们的女主人卡西娅女士。他的疯狂与固执，给整座星站带来了灭顶之灾。他在暴怒之中睁开了第三只眼，将亚空间的恐怖力量释放在了那些令他不满的人身上。如果您没有亲身经历过这些，这一切很难解释清楚，不过我还是打算试着向您解释一下。”
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都得怪欧拉克五号星的第二任守护者，西奥巴德·奥塞罗。那位老人……曾是位伟大的导航者，但他已经无法控制他的力量。我要求他让位，但他过于迷恋我们的女主人卡西娅女士。他的疯狂与固执，给整座星站带来了灭顶之灾。他在暴怒之中睁开了第三只眼，将亚空间的恐怖力量释放在了那些令他不满的人身上。如果您没有亲身经历过这些，这一切很难解释清楚，不过我还是打算试着向您解释一下。”

languages.text: 「悪いのは、ユーラック・Vの2代目保持者シオボールド・オーセリオだ。あの老人は…偉大な航宙士だったが、もはや自分の力を制御できない。強く引退を勧めたが、彼は我らの主カシア様にひどく執着していた。シオボールドの狂気と頑固さでステーションは丸ごと破滅へと向かった。彼は怒りの発作で第三の目を開き、気に入らない者達に<歪み>の恐怖を解き放ったんだよ。私の知る昔のシオボールドは、決してこんな無謀なやり方で力を使う事はなかった。経験していない者に説明するのは難しいが、なんとかしてみよう」
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

traits.locale_text: 「悪いのは、ユーラック・Vの2代目管理人テオバルド・オーセリオだ。あの老人は…偉大な航宙士だったが、もはや自分の力を制御できない。強く引退を勧めたけれど、彼は我らの主カシア様に固執しすぎた。テオバルドの狂気と頑固さでステーションは丸ごと破滅へと向かった。彼は怒りの発作で第三の目を開き、気に入らない者達に<歪み>の恐怖を解き放ったんだよ。私の知る昔のテオバルドは、こんな無謀なやり方で決して力を使う事はなかった。経験していない者に説明するのは難しいが、なんとか頑張ってみよう」

「悪いのは、ユーラック・Vの2代目保持者シオボールド・オーセリオだ。あの老人は…偉大な航宙士だったが、もはや自分の力を制御できない。強く引退を勧めたが、彼は我らの主カシア様にひどく執着していた。シオボールドの狂気と頑固さでステーションは丸ごと破滅へと向かった。彼は怒りの発作で第三の目を開き、気に入らない者達に<歪み>の恐怖を解き放ったんだよ。私の知る昔のシオボールドは、決してこんな無謀なやり方で力を使う事はなかった。経験していない者に説明するのは難しいが、なんとかしてみよう」

languages.text: «La culpa es de Theobald Orsellio, segundo guardián de Eurac V. El anciano... era un gran navegante, pero ya no podía controlar sus poderes. Le rogué que dejara el cargo, pero estaba obsesionado con nuestra señora, lady Cassia. Su locura y su testarudez trajeron la condena a toda la estación, ya que le impulsaron a abrir su tercer ojo, presa de la ira, y a desatar los horrores de la disformidad contra quienes le habían desagradado. El Theobald al que conocía nunca habría usado sus poderes de forma tan indiscriminada. No será fácil explicar esto a los no iniciados, pero debo intentarlo».
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."

El Theobald al que conocía nunca habría usado sus poderes de forma tan indiscriminada. No será fácil explicar esto a los no iniciados, pero debo intentarlo».

languages.text: "Onu Eurac V'in ikinci Sorumlusu Theobald Orsellio'ya soracaksın. Çok büyük Rotacı'ydı ihtiyar. Zamanla güçlerine söz geçiremez oldu. Bıraksın diye çok yalvardım ama hanımımıza, Leydi Cassia'ya kafayı takmıştı bir kere. İnat etti, dinlemedi. Sonunda bütün istasyonun sonunu getirdi. Bir anda kendini kaybedip üçüncü gözünü açtı, öteboyutta ne kadar dehşet varsa onu kızdıranların üzerine saldı. Benim bildiğim Theobald, hayatta öyle fevri hareketler yapmazdı. Şimdi, konudan habersiz olanlara anlatması güç fakat deneyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "The blame lies with Theobald Orsellio, the second Keeper of Eurac V. The old man... was a great Navigator, but he could no longer control his powers. I begged him to retire, but he was too obsessed with our mistress, Lady Cassia. His madness and stubbornness spelled doom for the entire station, for he opened his third eye in a fit of rage and unleashed the horrors of the warp on those who displeased him. The Theobald I knew would never have used his powers in such a reckless manner. This will be difficult to explain to the uninitiated, but I am going to try."
